gearList.item: Led a team to develop a WebGL-based e-commerce platform using WebAR/WebVR technology that generated $350k in revenue.
Cleaned and compressed street 3D model to minimize file size and load time on the web while developing and maintaining e-commerce Metaverse.
Developed an Educational Metaverse on the web with integrated real-time voice and video chat functionality.
Created an interactive 3D map visualization using R3F, showcasing data points and geographic information in a visually appealing manner.

Maintained popular THREE.js Web Virtual Exhibition that received over 5 million visitors and increased brand awareness by 30% for leading technology company, demonstrating reliability and attention to detail.
Created highly interactive 3D visualizations of network infrastructure using THREE.js and REACT.
Developed a cutting-edge WebGL project enabling online furniture design, resulting in a substantial 35% increase in sales for a furniture manufacturing company.
Designed and implemented a highly-scalable e-commerce platform using REACT and Node.js.
Created a WebVR virtual touring project for a real estate company specializing in home sales using THREE.js.
Launched 6 2D/3D animated Websites using REACT, THREE.js and GSAP.
Developed and implemented accessibility strategies to ensure web applications are accessible to all users, including those with disabilities.
Enhanced UI sound effects by 30% using Web Audio API, creating a more immersive user experience and receiving positive client feedback.
